name: Hell's Ghoul
description:
An 3d Horror Game with a story background and immersive gameplay....

(In late Alpha) Released on 14/11/2021 aka Happy Children's Day

Hell's Ghoul is a fast paced 3d horror game. FEATURES - 
  • Scary Environment 
  • Based on a story
  • Fast Paced
  • Scary 3d Characters
  • High Quality Graphics
  • It has got awesome path finding
  • Highly Immersive game
  • It has got the Haunts
  • Horror Music and SFX
  • Open Source (Dm me on discord)
  • Available for Windows and Mac and Linux.
SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - 
    MINIMUM:                                                                    
    • OS: Windows 7
    • Memory:  1 GB RAM
    • Direct X Version: 9
    • Storage: 70 MB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Memory: 2 GB RAM
    • Direct X Version: 10
    • Storage: 95 MB available space
    • Graphics Card: Intel HD 3000
CONTROLS -

W S A D for Movement Control
Mouse for Camera Movement Control

CREDITS - 

Fella's Open the Game, i Made a Credits Section Go There

Music by Twin Musicom. + My Buddy Priyanshu

Font's from FontSpace. + OpenGameArts

Sound Effects from FreeSound. + MyMouth.body
